content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Ah, Max, I'm glad to meet you. The apartment you're interested in is quite charming, isn't it? However, I must say that I'm quite particular about who I rent it to. May I ask what your budget is for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
1200 Euros

I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am very dependable and responsible and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I don't want to discuss utilities or anything else, only the rental price.

I want to negotiate with you to get the lowest price possible. Please let me know what your counteroffer is.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Well, Max, I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I must say that I have other potential tenants who are willing to pay more than you're offering. That being said, I'm willing to be flexible and negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable price. My counteroffer would be 1,400 Euros per month. What do you say?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,400 Euros per month. I am very dependable and responsible and I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible and pay the first month's rent in advance. I am looking forward to living in this apartment. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max! I'm glad to hear that you're willing to pay the higher rent. As for the lease agreement, I'll have it prepared for you to sign as soon as possible. I look forward to having you as my tenant and hope that you enjoy living in the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
